refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The MilterServerContext processes one server side milter protocol session. It means MilterServerContext instance is created for each milter protocol session.

refsect2.title: MILTER_SERVER_CONTEXT_ERROR
refsect2.para: Used to get the GError quark for MilterServerContext errors.

refsect2.title: MILTER_SERVER_CONTEXT_DEFAULT_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT
refsect2.para: The default connection timeout by seconds.

refsect2.title: MILTER_SERVER_CONTEXT_DEFAULT_WRITING_TIMEOUT
refsect2.para: The default writing timeout by seconds.

refsect2.title: MILTER_SERVER_CONTEXT_DEFAULT_READING_TIMEOUT
refsect2.para: The default reading timeout by seconds.

refsect2.title: MILTER_SERVER_CONTEXT_DEFAULT_END_OF_MESSAGE_TIMEOUT
refsect2.para: The default end-of-message response timeout by seconds.

refsect2.title: enum MilterServerContextError
refsect2.para: These identify the variable errors that can occur while calling MilterServerContext functions.

listitem.simpara: Indicates the connection spec isn't set.
Indicates unexpected response is received on the current MilterServerContextState.
Indicates a new operation is requested before the previous operation's response is received.
Indicates an IO error causing on writing/reading milter protocol data.
Indicates unsupported newer version is requested.

refsect2.title: enum MilterServerContextState
refsect2.programlisting: typedef enum { MILTER_SERVER_CONTEXT_STATE_INVALID, MILTER_SERVER_CONTEXT_STATE_START, MILTER_SERVER_CONTEXT_STATE_DEFINE_MACRO, MILTER_SERVER_CONTEXT_STATE_NEGOTIATE, MILTER_SERVER_CONTEXT_STATE_CONNECT, MILTER_SERVER_CONTEXT_STATE_HELO, MILTER_SERVER_CONTEXT_STATE_ENVELOPE_FROM, MILTER_SERVER_CONTEXT_STATE_ENVELOPE_RECIPIENT, MILTER_SERVER_CONTEXT_STATE_DATA, MILTER_SERVER_CONTEXT_STATE_UNKNOWN, MILTER_SERVER_CONTEXT_STATE_HEADER, MILTER_SERVER_CONTEXT_STATE_END_OF_HEADER, MILTER_SERVER_CONTEXT_STATE_BODY, MILTER_SERVER_CONTEXT_STATE_END_OF_MESSAGE, MILTER_SERVER_CONTEXT_STATE_QUIT, MILTER_SERVER_CONTEXT_STATE_ABORT } MilterServerContextState;
refsect2.para: These identify the state of MilterServerContext.

refsect2.title: milter_server_context_set_connection_timeout ()
refsect2.para: Sets the timeout by seconds on connection. If context doesn't connects to client in timeout seconds, "timeout" signal is emitted.

listitem.simpara: the connection timeout by seconds. (default is MILTER_SERVER_CONTEXT_DEFAULT_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT)

refsect2.title: milter_server_context_set_writing_timeout ()
refsect2.para: Sets the timeout by seconds on writing. If context doesn't write to client socket in timeout seconds, "timeout" signal is emitted.

listitem.simpara: the writing timeout by seconds. (default is MILTER_SERVER_CONTEXT_DEFAULT_WRITING_TIMEOUT)

refsect2.title: milter_server_context_set_reading_timeout ()
refsect2.para: Sets the timeout by seconds on reading. If context doesn't receive response from client socket in timeout seconds, "timeout" signal is emitted.

listitem.simpara: the reading timeout by seconds. (default is MILTER_SERVER_CONTEXT_DEFAULT_READING_TIMEOUT)

refsect2.title: milter_server_context_set_end_of_message_timeout ()
refsect2.para: Sets the timeout by seconds on end-of-message. If context doesn't receive response for end-of-message from client socket in timeout seconds, "timeout" signal is emitted.

listitem.simpara: the timeout by seconds on end-of-message. (default is MILTER_SERVER_CONTEXT_DEFAULT_END_OF_MESSAGE_TIMEOUT)

refsect2.title: milter_server_context_set_connection_spec ()
refsect2.para: Sets a connection specification of client. If spec is invalid format and error is not NULL, error detail is stored into error.

listitem.simpara: return location for an error, or NULL.

refsect2.title: milter_server_context_establish_connection ()
refsect2.para: Establishes a connection to client. If establishing is failed and error is not NULL, error detail is stored into error.

listitem.simpara: return location for an error, or NULL.
TRUE if any response is received after the last writing, FALSE otherwise.

refsect2.title: milter_server_context_connect ()
refsect2.programlisting: gboolean milter_server_context_connect (MilterServerContext *context, const gchar *host_name, struct sockaddr *address, socklen_t address_length);

listitem.simpara: the host name of connected SMTP client.
the address of connected SMTP client.

refsect2.title: milter_server_context_helo ()
refsect2.para: Sends the FQDN passed on HELO.

refsect2.title: milter_server_context_envelope_from ()
refsect2.para: Sends the parameter passed on MAIL FROM.

refsect2.title: milter_server_context_envelope_recipient ()
refsect2.para: Sends the parameter passed on RCPT TO.

milter_server_context_body ()
milter_server_context_end_of_message ()
refsect2.programlisting: gboolean milter_server_context_end_of_message (MilterServerContext *context, const gchar *chunk, gsize size);
refsect2.para: Notifies all body chunks are sent with optional the last body chunk.

refsect2.title: milter_server_context_is_enable_step ()
refsect2.para: Gets whether step flag is enabled in the context's option.

listitem.simpara: TRUE if step flags is enabled, FALSE otherwise.

refsect2.title: milter_server_context_get_skip_body ()
refsect2.para: Gets whether context received skip response on sending body chunks.

listitem.simpara: TRUE if body chunks are skipped, FALSE otherwise.

refsect2.title: The "connection-timeout" property
refsect2.para: The timeout seconds for connecting to a filter.

refsect2.title: The "end-of-message-timeout" property
refsect2.para: The timeout seconds between sending end-of-message to a filter and waiting for its reply.

refsect2.title: The "message-result" property
refsect2.para: Result of the current processing message.

refsect2.title: The "reading-timeout" property
refsect2.para: The timeout seconds for reading reply from a filter.

refsect2.title: The "writing-timeout" property
refsect2.para: The timeout seconds for writing information from MTA to a filter.
